pros: Challenging courses and very competent teachers. Provide several services for your classes and future career.

job_title: IT Help Desk Support in Tokyo
pros: No overtime, no time pressure, work at your own pace, excellent leave package, most of the people are very nice, 5 minutes from nearest station, new campus, would give 5 star rating for work environment and people.
cons: No career growth unless someone retires, salary package not market competitive, only a few good managers, most managers keep on ordering people around, managers do not provide any training or does not inspire any confidence

pros: nice colleagues, nice environment, nice students
cons: no collaboration, very selective, strange leadership

review_title: Too much politics, good for moms
pros: co-workers are nice and some of them are still friends after quit.
cons: too many politics in the university and old style working space in Japan campus

pros: Loved working there, there were lots of cool people

review_title: Laid-back work environment, but promotion seems to come only with age.
pros: 35 hours/week, tons of holidays, most of the staff are nice
cons: Limited room for advancement, high turnover.
